title: Utilising Machine Learning for Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Evaluation: Transitioning from Committees to Climate
content:
Publication date: Available online 5 October 2024

Source: Sustainable Futures

Author(s): Dr. Ravichandran K. Subramaniam, Dr. Shyamala Dhoraisingam Samuel, Dr. Manjeevan Seera, Dr. Nafis Alam
